mapper.select: select num as bookNum, tb1.name as bookName, case when tb2.returned = 'N' then 'N' else 'Y' end as rentalPossible, tb2.name as rentalMan from books tb1 left outer join ( select t1.*, t2.name from rental_history t1 inner join members t2 on t1.member_idx=t2.idx where returned = 'N' ) tb2 on tb1.num = tb2.book_num where isExist = 'Y' order by tb1.num asc
